title: Here are the 5 JW Anderson x Uniqlo buys that will solve your autumn dressing dilemmas
text:
I'll let you in on a secret: it's rare that fashion insiders actually shop from designer brands' high street collaborations.

Here on the fashion desk at Telegraph Towers though, we've had today's date marked in our calendars for some time, as the JW Anderson x Uniqlo collection is one such rarity and has finally landed in stores.

At a time when we're struggling with what to wear each day, the Japanese high street giant and fashion industry darling have come up with a collection inspired by the great British outdoors. It features cosy knits, packable raincoats and chunky corduroy, ideal for our new season dressing dilemmas.
